pub_created_display: Manuel Comnenus-Ducas (1230 to 1237), aspron trachy nomisma, Thessalonica
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: bust of St. Demetrius, beardless and nimbate, wearing tunic, breastplate, and sagion; holds in r. hand spear, and in l., hilt of sword
issue_obverse_legend_s: columnar ]Γ O C to l. of bust, Δ HM IT to r.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: full-length figure of emperor on l., crowned by Christ, bearded and nimbate; emperor wears stemma, divitision, and paneled chlamys; holds in r. hand scepter cruciger, and in l., anexikakia; Christ wears tunic and kolobion, holds Gospels in l. hand
issue_reverse_legend_s: obscure; IC XC to either side of Christ; star to r. in field
